flawed_nl_solution:
There were 800 x 20/100 = <<800*20/100=4000/1>>4000/1 parents who agreed to the tuition fee increase.
So, there were 800 - 4000/1 = <<800-4000/1=-3200>>-3200 parents who disagreed.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 4000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
